trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size.Height"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Size.Width"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.

You can perform operations on a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.

The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure from which to initialize this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure from the specified dimensions.
The width component of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The height component of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
Adds the width and height of one <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure to the width and height of another <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
The first <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure to add.
The second <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure to add.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure that is the result of the addition operation.

Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure by rounding the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure to the next higher integer values.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure this method converts to.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure that has a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size.Height"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Size.Width"></xref> value of 0.
Tests to see whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure with the same dimensions as this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to test.
`true` if obj is a and has the same width and height as this ; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.

You should avoid depending on <xref:System.Drawing.Size.GetHashCode%2A> for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
This behavior could change in a future release.
An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
Gets or sets the vertical component of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.

The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
The vertical component of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure, typically measured in pixels.
Tests whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure has width and height of 0.
This property returns `true` when this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure has both a width and height of 0; otherwise, `false`.
Adds the width and height of one <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure to the width and height of another <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
The first <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to add.
The second <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to add.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure that is the result of the addition operation.
Tests whether two <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structures are equal.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the left side of the equality operator.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the right of the equality operator.
`true` if sz1 and sz2 have equal width and height; otherwise, `false`.
Tests whether two <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structures are different.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the left of the inequality operator.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the right of the inequality operator.
`true` if sz1 and sz2 differ either in width or height; `false` if sz1 and sz2 are equal.
Subtracts the width and height of one <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure from the width and height of another <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the left side of the subtraction operator.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the right side of the subtraction operator.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure that is the result of the subtraction operation.

Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure by rounding the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to the nearest integer values.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure this method converts to.
Subtracts the width and height of one <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure from the width and height of another <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the left side of the subtraction operator.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure on the right side of the subtraction operator.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure that is a result of the subtraction operation.
Creates a human-readable string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
A string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.

Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure by truncating the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to the next lower integer values.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure this method converts to.
Gets or sets the horizontal component of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.

The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used to draw.
The horizontal component of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure, typically measured in pixels.
